title: The Bandman Rill Interview: Pioneering Jersey Club Drill, Newark Upbringing, Cuffing Straggs & More
description:
Bandman Rill speaks on his come-up, Jersey, bringing a new sound, getting popular after his 3rd song, and more!

-----
00:00 Intro
1:14 Newark is still very much grimey
3:25 Very close to his mom, and his dad left with some other woman
3:52 Used to have anger issues when he was younger so he started boxing 
5:25 Started boxing at 9 years old, boxed all the way until he started rappin
6:12 Rill says he can fight anyone his size, doesn't really respect the Jake Pauls of the world in the ring
9:54 Rill built his own home studio with his own money, learning how to engineer, etc
11:01 Only took music seriously after his homie D Loc passed
12:02 Rill has 11 brothers, 10 of them are rappers
12:36 Getting positive reactions after his 3rd song, this girl Pauline posted on IG that his music was ass, Rill used it as fuel to go harder 
14:25 Rill wants in on Adam's side activities 
17:08 Rill says 2Rare didn't invent anything but respects his hustle 
18:43 Rill says people stay stealin from Jersey and no one ever says anything but Rill wants to be that voice19:51 Rill says drill ispopular for the wrong reasons 
22:56 "I was never in these streets!" Adam thought Rill was a scammer 
24:10 "Nobody wants to cuff a straaaaggg!" lol
24:45 "Body count doesn't matter, as long as I don't know any of them" lol 
25:25 Rill wants a girl who does something productive other than s___ d__
26:04 Rill wet to Fig real quick 
27:37 Rill says he doesn't wanna be categorized as drill
28:42 Rill says NY rappers used to look down on Jersey wave, now they are all over it 
30:28 Very good relationship with Sha EK
32:13 Working with Sha EK and Kodak
34:18 Rill says he's the biggest artist from Jersey right now 
36:43 Fighting in high school 
37:41 Relationship with Warhol 
39:23 Dropping his new tape in October, says Drake could've taped in with the right people who pioneered the sound


-----
